segments.text: What do you think about the equipment in our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have to equip our company with a network of work stations at every office and show room as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I also realized this issue . And office automation is essential .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Besides , Internet tends to be more essential now in the information age .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . A network of work stations is helpful for our management .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And , to be frank , our copying machines are too slow ; our telephone system is limited in function .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are right . The current equipment of our offices really falls behind . Next week , you can provide me a catalogue of new equipment .
segments.speaker: S1
